CustomField.description: Validation on this field required the manager field to be populated first. Minimum Badge Count is based on formula field Potential_Ranger__c being set to true. If the limit changes from the current value of 85, then the formula will need to be updated. The process will only @mention the manager if the manager is a user of the org and the checkbox Honorary_Trailhead_Ranger__c is not already true. This should handle the case where the 85 badge limit is increased beyond a point where existing rangers are in terms of badge counts
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this person crosses the badge threshold required to become an Honorary Trailhead Ranger, then @mention their manager.
CustomField.label: Notify Mgr if Ranger Badge Count Met
